summary: Ghorbash an Orc Follower in Dushnihk Yal is redone, NOT done better, just redone for an alternate choice as a follower.
descriptionHtml:
ApachiiSkyHair required
High Quality Eyes by Xenius (recommended)

Just a secondary choice to a follower\'s everyday look, I based this model after my character \"Krug\" which is also a downloadable savegame where you can play as this model. Enjoy

If you are not an Orc, to gain access to any Orc stronghold you must do Blood-Kin quests to get good reputation amongst the Orcs.
author: Zyphis
